newsitem.title: GERMANY: RESEARCH ALERT-CSFB upgrades Allianz to buy.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT-CSFB upgrades Allianz to buy.

text.p: Credit Suisse -First Boston said on Tuesday it has raised its rating on German insurance group Allianz AG to buy from market performer and set a target price for Allianz shares at 560 marks.
Allianz shares were up 26.50 marks at 446 marks in bourse dealings. The 30-share DAX index was up 98.75 marks at 4,207.15 points.
